projects.name: Jayna AI Brain - Predictive Inventory Intelligence System
projects.description: Self-learning AI system that watches sales, learns recipes, predicts ingredient needs, and emails private insights to ownership. Silent operation - staff never see it.

tech_stack.backend: Vercel Serverless Functions (Node.js), Vercel Cron Jobs
tech_stack.ml_models: Prophet (time series forecasting), ARIMA (backup), rule-based intelligence (Phase 1)

database_schema.brain_daily_sales: Normalized sales data from all sources (Toast POS, catering)
database_schema.brain_recipes: Menu items mapped to ingredients with confidence scores
database_schema.brain_insights: Generated insights with email delivery tracking

key_features.inverse_learning: Watches sales + prep counts to learn recipe portions automatically
key_features.sales_forecasting: Predicts next 7 days of sales (seasonality, trends, events)
key_features.ingredient_prediction: Maps forecasted sales to ingredient needs via learned recipes
key_features.cost_tracking: Detects price increases before they impact margins
key_features.pattern_detection: Identifies customer behavior, waste, operational inefficiencies
key_features.continuous_improvement: Auto-retrains models with new data, improves accuracy over time

insights_delivered.daily: Critical alerts only (stockouts, unusual patterns, cost warnings)
insights_delivered.weekly: Sales forecast, ordering recommendations, top sellers, margin analysis
insights_delivered.monthly: Seasonal trends, menu optimization, waste reduction, customer patterns

success_metrics.week_4: 20 menu items mapped, 70%+ accuracy on recipe portions
success_metrics.week_8: Daily emails flowing, 15% forecast accuracy, 1+ stockout prevented
success_metrics.week_12: 50+ items mapped, 10% forecast accuracy, self-improving portions
success_metrics.month_6: 5% forecast accuracy, $1000+ waste prevented, 3+ menu optimizations

open_questions: Recipe input method: Google Sheet, web form, or voice call?
Email frequency: Daily insights, weekly summary, or real-time alerts + weekly?
Initial focus: Ingredient ordering, sales forecasting, or cost warnings?
Historical data: How far back can we fetch from Toast POS and catering?
projects.status_notes: Comprehensive 734-line plan created. Awaiting user approval and recipe data collection to begin Phase 1 development.
projects.estimated_cost: $0-100/month (Vercel free tier + optional ML API in Phase 5+)
projects.privacy: 100% private - only demetri7@gmail.com receives insights, zero staff visibility

projects.name: Jayna Cash Counter - Restaurant Management Platform
projects.description: Full-featured restaurant management platform for Jayna Gyro

features: Smart CASH button with time-based routing

catering_orders.notes: All 4 webhook subscriptions active and verified. 95% confident in automatic sync for new orders.

recent_milestones.description: COMPLETE EZCATER WEBHOOK FIX: Fixed subscriptions, customer name parsing, created import-by-number tool. All 4 webhooks active.
Added AM Cash Count viewer to FOH WATCHDOG tab
Smart CASH button with time-based AM/PM flows + password protection
Fixed FOH delete checklist overlay errors + hardcoded filtering

next_steps: Continue with user requests as they come
